trans-unit.source: It replaces four consecutive space characters in a string with a tab character.
trans-unit.target: 它用制表符替换字符串中的四个连续空格字符。

trans-unit.source: To run it, you must supply two command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行它，您必须提供两个命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The first is the name of an existing text file to redirect the standard input stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第一个是要将标准输入流重定向到的现有文本文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The second is the name of a file to redirect the standard output stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是要将标准输出流重定向到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This file need not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此文件不需要存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does, its contents will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果它这么做，其内容将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The internal stream buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 内部流缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the standard output stream, which is set to a specified buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 获取设置为指定缓冲区大小的标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: The standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to reacquire the standard output stream after it has been changed by the <xref:System.Console.SetOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于已由更改后重新获取标准输出流<xref:System.Console.SetOut%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Console.OpenStandardOutput%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Console.OpenStandardOutput%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: It replaces four consecutive space characters in a string with a tab character.
trans-unit.target: 它用制表符替换字符串中的四个连续空格字符。

trans-unit.source: To run it, you must supply two command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行它，您必须提供两个命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The first is the name of an existing text file to redirect the standard input stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第一个是要将标准输入流重定向到的现有文本文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The second is the name of a file to redirect the standard output stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是要将标准输出流重定向到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This file need not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此文件不需要存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does, its contents will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果它这么做，其内容将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> 小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that represents the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 表示标准输出流的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to the standard output stream by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性设置为标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to another stream with the <xref:System.Console.SetOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为另一个流<xref:System.Console.SetOut%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that calls to `Console.Out.WriteLine` methods are equivalent to calls to the corresponding <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，调用`Console.Out.WriteLine`方法是等效于调用相应<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A> property to display an array containing the names of files in the application's current directory to the standard output device.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.Out%2A>属性显示包含到标准输出设备的应用程序的当前目录中的文件的名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: It then sets the standard output to a file named Files.txt and lists the array elements to the file.
trans-unit.target: 然后将标准输出设置为一个名为 Files.txt 文件，并列出了对文件的数组元素。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it sets the output to the standard output stream and again displays the array elements to the standard output device.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它将输出设置写入标准输出流，也不会显示数组元素到标准输出设备。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding the console uses to write output.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控制台用于写入输出的编码。

trans-unit.source: The encoding used to write console output.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入控制台输出的编码。

trans-unit.source: The console uses the output encoding to translate characters written by an application into corresponding console display characters.
trans-unit.target: 控制台使用的输出编码将转换控制台显示的相应字符的应用程序写入的字符转换。

trans-unit.source: The default code page that the console uses is determined by the system locale.
trans-unit.target: 该控制台使用的默认代码页由系统区域设置确定。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], a property get operation may return a cached value instead of the console's current output encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，属性 get 操作可以返回而不是控制台的当前输出编码的缓存的值。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the value of the <xref:System.Console.OutputEncoding%2A> property is modified by some means other than an assignment to the <xref:System.Console.OutputEncoding%2A> property, such as calling the Windows `SetConsoleOutputCP` function.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况的值<xref:System.Console.OutputEncoding%2A>以外的分配给其他一些方式修改属性<xref:System.Console.OutputEncoding%2A>属性，例如在调用 Windows`SetConsoleOutputCP`函数。

trans-unit.source: The property value in a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 集运算中的属性值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the execution of this operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作期间出错。

trans-unit.source: Your application does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序没有执行此操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: for reading and writing to top-level windows and subwindows.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取和写入顶级窗口和子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Of the Unicode encodings, the <see cref="T:System.Console" /> class supports UTF-8 encoding with the <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" /> class and, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it supports UTF-16 encoding with the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 编码，<see cref="T:System.Console" />类支持 utf-8 编码与<see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />类，然后，使用启动[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，它支持使用编码的 utf-16<see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" />类。

trans-unit.source: UTF-32 encoding with the <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF32Encoding" /> class is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用 utf-32 编码<see cref="T:System.Text.UTF32Encoding" />不支持类。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the output encoding to UTF-32 throws an <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置的输出编码 utf-32 引发<see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that successfully displaying Unicode characters to the console requires the following:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，已成功向控制台显示 Unicode 字符需要以下：

trans-unit.source: The console must use a TrueType font, such as Lucida Console or Consolas, to display characters.
trans-unit.target: 控制台必须使用 TrueType 字体，例如 Lucida Console 或 Consolas，显示字符。

trans-unit.source: A font used by the console must define the particular glyph or glyphs to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 特定的标志符号或要显示的标志符号，则必须定义控制台使用的字体。

trans-unit.source: The console can take advantage of font linking to display glyphs from linked fonts if the base font does not contain a definition for that glyph.
trans-unit.target: 控制台可以利用链接以显示从链接字体的标志符号，如果基字体不包含该标志符号的定义的字体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about support for Unicode encoding by the console, see the "Unicode Support for the Console" section in the <see cref="T:System.Console" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Unicode 支持的详细信息编码由控制台中，请参阅"Unicode 支持的控制台"中部分<see cref="T:System.Console" />类。

trans-unit.source: Reads the next character from the standard input stream.
trans-unit.target: 从标准输入流读取下一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The next character from the input stream, or negative one (-1) if there are currently no more characters to be read.
trans-unit.target: 输入流中的下一个字符；如果当前没有更多的字符可供读取，则为负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.Read%2A> method blocks its return while you type input characters; it terminates when you press the <xref:System.ConsoleKey.Enter> key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.Read%2A>方法阻止其返回值时键入输入的字符; 它终止时按<xref:System.ConsoleKey.Enter>密钥。

trans-unit.source: Pressing Enter appends a platform-dependent line termination sequence to your input (for example, Windows appends a carriage return-linefeed sequence).
trans-unit.target: 按 Enter 将依赖于平台的行终止序列追加到你的输入 （例如，Windows 追加回车换行符序列）。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Console.Read%2A> method retrieve your input one character at a time.
trans-unit.target: 后续调用<xref:System.Console.Read%2A>方法一次检索你输入的一个字符。

trans-unit.source: After the final character is retrieved, <xref:System.Console.Read%2A> blocks its return again and the cycle repeats.
trans-unit.target: 检索最后一个字符后，<xref:System.Console.Read%2A>阻止其返回再次并重复上述循环。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method, or the <xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A> property and <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method are preferable to using the <xref:System.Console.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A>属性和<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法要优于使用<xref:System.Console.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the method does not return -1 unless you perform one of the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 请注意该方法不会不返回-1，除非你执行以下操作之一：

trans-unit.source: Simultaneously press the <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control> modifier key and <xref:System.ConsoleKey.Z> console key (Ctrl+Z), which signals the end-of-file condition.
trans-unit.target: 同时按<xref:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control>修改键和<xref:System.ConsoleKey.Z>控制台键 (Ctrl + Z)，指示文件尾条件。

trans-unit.source: Press an equivalent key that signals the end-of-file condition, such as the F6 function key in Windows.
trans-unit.target: 按等效键，用于通知的文件尾条件，例如在 Windows 中的 F6 函数密钥。

trans-unit.source: Redirect the input stream to a source, such as a text file, that has an actual end-of-file character.
trans-unit.target: 将输入的流重定向到的源，如的文本文件，包含实际的文件尾字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Console.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户按下的下一个字符或功能键。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户按下的下一个字符或功能键。

trans-unit.source: The pressed key is displayed in the console window.
trans-unit.target: 按下的键显示在控制台窗口中。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes the <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKey" /> constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKey" /> 常数和对应于按下的控制台键的 Unicode 字符（如果存在这样的字符）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object also describes, in a bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> values, whether one or more Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 对象还在 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> 值的按位组合中描述是否在按下控制台键的同时按下了一个或多个 Shift、Alt 和 Ctrl 修改键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method, until a character or function key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法，即等待线程颁发上的块<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法，直到按下字符或功能键。

trans-unit.source: A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 字符或功能键可以为同一个或多个 Alt、 Ctrl 或 shift 键修改键一起按下组合。

trans-unit.source: However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method to return.
trans-unit.target: 但是，修改键按下不会导致<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法以返回。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your application, you might want to use the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于你的应用程序，你可能想要使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法结合<xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the <xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>即使标准输入重定向到的文件，方法将读取从键盘<xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common uses of the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey> method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的一个用途的<xref:System.Console.ReadKey>方法是停止程序执行，直到用户按下某个键和应用程序终止或显示其他窗口的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey> method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey>方法以等待用户按下 Enter 键，然后终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Note that this overload of the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method by default echoes any displayable keys that the user presses to the console.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此重载<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法默认情况下的将回显到控制台用户按下任何可显示密钥。

trans-unit.source: To suppress them, call the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method with an `intercept` argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消它们，调用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法替换`intercept`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey> method to display information about which key the user pressed..
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey>方法以显示有关哪个密钥用户按下的信息...

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Console.In" /> property is redirected from some stream other than the console.
trans-unit.target: 从控制台以外的某个流重定向 <see cref="P:System.Console.In" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to display the pressed key in the console window.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在控制台窗口中显示按下的键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to not display the pressed key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则不显示按下的键；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户按下的下一个字符或功能键。

trans-unit.source: The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
trans-unit.target: 按下的键可以选择显示在控制台窗口中。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes the <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKey" /> constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKey" /> 常数和对应于按下的控制台键的 Unicode 字符（如果存在这样的字符）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object also describes, in a bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> values, whether one or more Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 对象还在 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> 值的按位组合中描述是否在按下控制台键的同时按下了一个或多个 Shift、Alt 和 Ctrl 修改键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method waits, that is, blocks on the thread issuing the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method, until a character or function key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法，即等待线程颁发上的块<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法，直到按下字符或功能键。

trans-unit.source: A character or function key can be pressed in combination with one or more Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 字符或功能键可以为同一个或多个 Alt、 Ctrl 或 shift 键修改键一起按下组合。

trans-unit.source: However, pressing a modifier key by itself will not cause the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method to return.
trans-unit.target: 但是，修改键按下不会导致<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法以返回。

trans-unit.source: If the `intercept` parameter is `true`, the pressed key is intercepted and not displayed in the console window; otherwise, the pressed key is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`intercept`参数是`true`，截获按下的键，并且不显示在控制台窗口中; 否则为将显示按下的键。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your application, you might want to use the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于你的应用程序，你可能想要使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法结合<xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method reads from the keyboard even if the standard input is redirected to a file with the <xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>即使标准输入重定向到的文件，方法将读取从键盘<xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common uses of the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method is to halt program execution until the user presses a key and the app either terminates or displays an additional window of information.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的一个用途的<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法是停止程序执行，直到用户按下某个键和应用程序终止或显示其他窗口的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%28System.Boolean%29> method to wait for the user to press the Enter key before terminating the app.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%28System.Boolean%29>方法以等待用户按下 Enter 键，然后终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Note that, if the user presses any other key, it is not echoed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否用户按任何其他键时，它不回显到控制台。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%28System.Boolean%29> method to display information about the key pressed by a user without echoing that key to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%28System.Boolean%29>方法以显示有关按下用户，而无需回显到控制台该注册表项的键的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Console.In" /> property is redirected from some stream other than the console.
trans-unit.target: 从控制台以外的某个流重定向 <see cref="P:System.Console.In" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Reads the next line of characters from the standard input stream.
trans-unit.target: 从标准输入流读取下一行字符。

trans-unit.source: The next line of characters from the input stream, or <see langword="null" /> if no more lines are available.
trans-unit.target: 输入流中的下一行字符；如果没有更多的可用行，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method reads a line from the standard input stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法从标准输入流中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: (For the definition of a line, see the paragraph after the following list.) This means that:
trans-unit.target: （有关行的定义，请参阅段落后下面的列表。）这表示：

trans-unit.source: If the standard input device is the keyboard, the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method blocks until the user presses the **Enter** key.
trans-unit.target: 标准输入的设备是否键盘，<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法阻塞，直到用户按可实现**Enter**密钥。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common uses of the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method is to pause program execution before clearing the console and displaying new information to it, or to prompt the user to press the Enter key before terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的一个用途的<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法是暂停程序执行之前清除控制台并显示新信息，或者提示用户按下 Enter 键，然后终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了这一点。

trans-unit.source: If standard input is redirected to a file, the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method reads a line of text from a file.
trans-unit.target: 标准输入重定向到一个文件，如果<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法从文件中读取一行文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following is a text file named ReadLine1.txt:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面是一个名为 ReadLine1.txt 文本文件：

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method to read input that is redirected from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法来读取从文件重定向的输入。

trans-unit.source: The read operation terminates when the method returns `null`, which indicates that no lines remain to be read.
trans-unit.target: 读取的操作终止时该方法返回`null`，这指示没有线仍要读取。

trans-unit.source: After compiling the example to an executable named ReadLine1.exe, you can run it from the command line with the syntax
trans-unit.target: 后编译到可执行文件的命名 ReadLine1.exe 示例，你可以运行使用从命令行语法

trans-unit.source: to read the contents of the file and display them to the console.
trans-unit.target: 读取文件的内容并将它们显示到控制台。

trans-unit.source: A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (hexadecimal 0x000d), a line feed (hexadecimal 0x000a), or the value of the <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 将行定义为字符后跟回车符 (十六进制 0x000d)、 换行符 (十六进制 0x000a) 或值的序列<xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned string does not contain the terminating character(s).
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串不包含的终止字符。

trans-unit.source: By default, the method reads input from a 256-character input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该方法读取输入 256 个字符输入缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: Because this includes the <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> character(s), the method can read lines that contain up to 254 characters.
trans-unit.target: 因为这包括<xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字符，该方法可以读取包含超过 254 个字符的行。

trans-unit.source: To read longer lines, call the <xref:System.Console.OpenStandardInput%28System.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要读取较长的行，调用<xref:System.Console.OpenStandardInput%28System.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method executes synchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>方法以同步方式执行。

trans-unit.source: That is, it blocks until a line is read or the Ctrl+Z keyboard combination is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 即，被阻止，直至读取行或按下 Ctrl + Z 键盘组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.In%2A> property returns a <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object that represents the standard input stream and that has both a synchronous <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and an asynchronous <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.In%2A>属性返回<xref:System.IO.TextReader>对象，它表示标准输入的流并具有这两个同步<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和异步<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, when used as the console's standard input stream, the <xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> executes synchronously rather than asynchronously and returns a `Task<String>` only after the read operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当用作控制台的标准输入流，<xref:System.IO.TextReader.ReadLineAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>同步而不是以异步方式执行，并返回`Task<String>`仅完成读取的操作后。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> exception, the reader's position in the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> object is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> buffer are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>异常，而在基础读取器的位置<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象高级的字符的方法是可以读取，但已读入内部的字符数<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>缓冲区是丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Since the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 由于不能更改流中读取器的位置，因此已读取的字符是不可恢复，并可以访问仅通过重新初始化<xref:System.IO.TextReader>。

trans-unit.source: If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> also needs to be reinitialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果流中的初始位置是未知或流不支持查找，基础<xref:System.IO.Stream>还需要重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: To avoid such a situation and to produce robust code, you should use the <xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A> property and <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> method and store the read characters in a pre-allocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免这种情况并生成可靠的代码，应使用<xref:System.Console.KeyAvailable%2A>属性和<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>只读方法和应用商店中预先分配的缓冲区的字符。

trans-unit.source: If the Ctrl+Z character is pressed when the method is reading input from the console, the method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法是从控制台读取输入时按 Ctrl + Z 字符，该方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This enables the user to prevent further keyboard input when the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A> method is called in a loop.
trans-unit.target: 这使用户以防止进一步的键盘输入时<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A>在循环中调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The following example requires two command line arguments: the name of an existing text file, and the name of a file to write the output to.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例要求两个命令行自变量： 的现有文本文件的名称和要将输出写入到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: It opens the existing text file and redirects the standard input from the keyboard to that file.
trans-unit.target: 打开现有的文本文件，并将该文件从键盘的标准输入重定向。

trans-unit.source: It also redirects the standard output from the console to the output file.
trans-unit.target: 它还将从控制台到输出文件的标准输出重定向。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to read each line in the file, replaces every sequence of four spaces with a tab character, and uses the <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to write the result to the output file.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:System.Console.ReadLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来读取在文件中，每个行，每个序列的四个空格替换制表符，并使用<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来将结果写入到输出文件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存来为返回的字符串分配缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the next line of characters is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 下一行中的字符的字符数大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground and background console colors to their defaults.
trans-unit.target: 将控制台的前景色和背景色设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: The foreground and background colors are restored to the colors that existed when the current process began.
trans-unit.target: 前景色和背景颜色将还原为当前进程开始时存在的颜色。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Console.ForegroundColor%2A> and <xref:System.Console.BackgroundColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Console.ForegroundColor%2A>和<xref:System.Console.BackgroundColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example saves the values of the <xref:System.ConsoleColor> enumeration to an array and stores the current values of the <xref:System.Console.BackgroundColor%2A> and <xref:System.Console.ForegroundColor%2A> properties to variables.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将保存的值<xref:System.ConsoleColor>枚举到一个数组，并将存储的当前值<xref:System.Console.BackgroundColor%2A>和<xref:System.Console.ForegroundColor%2A>到变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: It then changes the foreground color to each color in the <xref:System.ConsoleColor> enumeration except to the color that matches the current background, and it changes the background color to each color in the <xref:System.ConsoleColor> enumeration except to the color that matches the current foreground.
trans-unit.target: 然后前景色更改为在每个颜色<xref:System.ConsoleColor>枚举只不过为颜色匹配当前的背景中，并且它的背景色更改为在每个颜色<xref:System.ConsoleColor>与匹配的颜色除枚举当前前景色。

trans-unit.source: (If the foreground color is the same as the background color, the text isn't visible.) Finally, it calls the <xref:System.Console.ResetColor%2A> method to restore the original console colors.
trans-unit.target: （如果相同的背景色的前景色，文本不是可见。）最后，它调用<xref:System.Console.ResetColor%2A>方法还原原始的控制台颜色。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 用户没有执行此操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: for modifying safe top-level windows and subwindows.

trans-unit.target: 缓冲区的宽度，以列为单位。

trans-unit.source: The height of the buffer area measured in rows.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区的高度，以行为单位。

trans-unit.source: Sets the height and width of the screen buffer area to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 将屏幕缓冲区的高度和宽度设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A> properties; and the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A>属性; 与<xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width.
trans-unit.target: 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区的宽度屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。

trans-unit.source: Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例将移动到的向上箭头，按下的向下箭头、 向左键或向右箭头控制台键的响应中的控制台窗口。

trans-unit.source: The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 网格模式有助于你查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。

trans-unit.source: The column position of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的列位置。

trans-unit.source: Columns are numbered from left to right starting at 0.
trans-unit.target: 将从 0 开始从左到右对列进行编号。

trans-unit.source: The row position of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Rows are numbered from top to bottom starting at 0.
trans-unit.target: 从上到下，从 0 开始为行编号。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 设置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Console.SetCursorPosition%2A> method to specify where the next write operation in the console window is to begin.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Console.SetCursorPosition%2A>方法，以指定在控制台窗口中下一步的写入操作即将开始。

trans-unit.source: If the specified cursor position is outside the area that is currently visible in the console window, the window origin changes automatically to make the cursor visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的光标的位置是在控制台窗口是当前可见区域之外，则窗口原点将自动更改以使光标可见。

trans-unit.source: The cursor automatically moves to the next character position each time a character is written to the console window.
trans-unit.target: 光标自动移动到每次一个字符写入到控制台窗口的下一个字符位置。

trans-unit.source: If the cursor is at the bottom right character position of the console window, the next write operation causes the console window to scroll so the cursor remains visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果光标位于控制台窗口的底部右侧的字符位置下, 一个写入操作将导致控制台窗口滚动，以使光标保持可见。

trans-unit.source: If you want to write a character to the bottom right character position without causing the console window to scroll, use the <xref:System.Console.MoveBufferArea%2A> method to move a character to that position.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要而不会导致控制台窗口中，以向下滚动，请使用将字符写入底部右侧的字符位置<xref:System.Console.MoveBufferArea%2A>方法将一个字符移到该位置。

trans-unit.source: The example positions the cursor, which determines where the next write will occur, to draw a 5 character by 5 character rectangle using a combination of "+", "|", and "-" strings.

trans-unit.source: Note that the rectangle could be drawn with fewer steps using a combination of other strings.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Console.SetIn%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: It replaces four consecutive space characters in a string with a tab character.
trans-unit.target: 它用制表符替换字符串中的四个连续空格字符。

trans-unit.source: To run it, you must supply two command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行它，您必须提供两个命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The first is the name of an existing text file to redirect the standard input stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第一个是要将标准输入流重定向到的现有文本文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The second is the name of a file to redirect the standard output stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是要将标准输出流重定向到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This file need not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此文件不需要存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does, its contents will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果它这么做，其内容将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newIn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newIn" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A stream that is the new standard output.
trans-unit.target: 一个流，它是新的标准输出。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Console.Out" /> property to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Console.Out" /> 属性设置为指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A> property is set to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Console.Out%2A>属性设置为标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> that encapsulates a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> can be used to send output to a file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>封装<xref:System.IO.FileStream>可以用于将输出发送到一个文件。

trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: It replaces four consecutive space characters in a string with a tab character.
trans-unit.target: 它用制表符替换字符串中的四个连续空格字符。

trans-unit.source: To run it, you must supply two command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行它，您必须提供两个命令行自变量。

trans-unit.source: The first is the name of an existing text file to redirect the standard input stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第一个是要将标准输入流重定向到的现有文本文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The second is the name of a file to redirect the standard output stream to.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是要将标准输出流重定向到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This file need not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此文件不需要存在。

trans-unit.source: If it does, its contents will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果它这么做，其内容将被覆盖。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newOut" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The column position of the upper left corner of the console window.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口左上角的列位置。

trans-unit.source: The row position of the upper left corner of the console window.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口左上角的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 设置控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。

trans-unit.source: The operating system window displays the console window, and the console window displays a portion of the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统窗口显示控制台窗口中，并控制台窗口会显示屏幕缓冲区的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A> method affects the position of the console window relative to the screen buffer, but does not affect the position of the operating system window relative to the desktop.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>方法影响的位置的控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区中，但不会影响相对于桌面操作系统窗口的位置。

trans-unit.source: The console and operating system windows generally do not affect each other.
trans-unit.target: 控制台和操作系统 windows 通常不会影响每个其他。

trans-unit.source: However, if the screen buffer cannot be displayed in the current boundaries of the console window, the operating system automatically appends scroll bars to the operating system window.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果屏幕缓冲区无法显示在控制台窗口的当前边界，操作系统会自动将滚动条到操作系统窗口。

trans-unit.source: In that case, moving the operating system window scroll bars affects the position of the console window, and moving the console window with the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A> method affects the position of the operating system window scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，移动操作系统窗口滚动条影响的位置的控制台窗口中，并移动控制台窗口<xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>方法影响操作系统窗口滚动条的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A> properties; and the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A>属性; 与<xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width.
trans-unit.target: 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区的宽度屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。

trans-unit.source: Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例将移动到的向上箭头，按下的向下箭头、 向左键或向右箭头控制台键的响应中的控制台窗口。

trans-unit.source: The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 网格模式有助于你查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="top" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="top" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> + <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> + <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferWidth" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="top" /> + <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="top" /> + <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferHeight" />。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 用户没有执行此操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: for modifying safe top-level windows and subwindows.
trans-unit.target: 修改安全顶级窗口和子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: The width of the console window measured in columns.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口的宽度，以列为单位。

trans-unit.source: The height of the console window measured in rows.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口的高度，以行为单位。

trans-unit.source: Sets the height and width of the console window to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 将控制台窗口的高度和宽度设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示<xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size.
trans-unit.target: 你必须运行该示例才能查看更改控制台窗口大小的完整效果。

trans-unit.source: The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key to be pressed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例报告设置为 85 列和 43 行的控制台窗口的尺寸，然后等待要按键。

trans-unit.source: When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press.
trans-unit.target: 当按任意键时，控制台窗口的尺寸会减半、 报告的新维度，和示例等待另一个按键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, when any key is pressed, the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates.
trans-unit.target: 最后，当按任意键时，控制台窗口还原到其原始尺寸和示例终止。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="width" /> or <paramref name="height" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="width" /> 或 <paramref name="height" /> 小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="width" /> plus <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowLeft" /> or <paramref name="height" /> plus <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="width" /> 加 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowLeft" /> 或 <paramref name="height" /> 加 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> 大于或等于 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="width" /> or <paramref name="height" /> is greater than the largest possible window width or height for the current screen resolution and console font.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="width" /> 或 <paramref name="height" /> 的值大于当前屏幕分辨率和控制台字体的最大可能的窗口宽度或高度。

trans-unit.target: 用户没有执行此操作的权限。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title to display in the console title bar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示在控制台标题栏中的标题。

trans-unit.source: The string to be displayed in the title bar of the console.
trans-unit.target: 要在控制台的标题栏中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the title string is 24500 characters.
trans-unit.target: 标题字符串的最大长度是 24500 个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示<xref:System.Console.Title%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the current title of the operating system window, waits for a key press, then displays a new title.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示当前操作系统窗口的标题、 等待按键，然后显示新标题。

trans-unit.source: In a get operation, the retrieved title is longer than 24500 characters.
trans-unit.target: 在获取操作中，检索到的标题长度超过 24500 个字符。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the specified title is longer than 24500 characters.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，指定的标题长度超过 24500 个字符。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the specified title is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，指定的标题是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: for modifying safe top-level windows and subwindows.
trans-unit.target: 修改安全顶级窗口和子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combination of the <see cref="F:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control" /> modifier key and <see cref="F:System.ConsoleKey.C" /> console key (Ctrl+C) is treated as ordinary input or as an interruption that is handled by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是将修改键 <see cref="F:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control" /> 和控制台键 <see cref="F:System.ConsoleKey.C" /> 的组合 (Ctrl+C) 视为普通输入，还是视为由操作系统处理的中断。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Ctrl+C is treated as ordinary input; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 Ctrl+C 视为普通输入，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Console.TreatControlCAsInput%2A> property is `false` and Ctrl+C is pressed, the pressed keys are not stored in the input buffer and the operating system terminates the currently executing process.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Console.TreatControlCAsInput%2A>属性是`false`并按下 Ctrl + C，按下的密钥不存储输入缓冲区中，并且操作系统终止当前正在执行的进程。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Use this property judiciously because setting it to `true` has such a dramatic effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性谨慎，因为将其设置为`true`具有如此显著的影响。

trans-unit.source: Most users expect Ctrl+C to terminate a console application.
trans-unit.target: 大多数用户期望 Ctrl + C 终止一个控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If you disable the effect of Ctrl+C, the user must remember to use Ctrl+Break to terminate the application, which is a less familiar key combination.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用 Ctrl + C 的效果，用户必须记得使用 Ctrl + Break 终止该应用程序，这是不太常见的键组合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.TreatControlCAsInput%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Console.TreatControlCAsInput%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Unable to get or set the input mode of the console input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 无法获取或设置控制台输入缓冲区的输入模式。

trans-unit.source: for modifying safe top-level windows and subwindows.
trans-unit.target: 修改安全顶级窗口和子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the console window area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控制台窗口区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the console window measured in rows.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口的高度，以行为单位。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> property when output is redirected throws either an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置的值<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>属性在输出重定向时将引发或者<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>或<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。

trans-unit.source: To prevent an exception, you can set the value of this property only if the <xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现异常，可以设置此属性仅当值<xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示<xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size.
trans-unit.target: 你必须运行该示例才能查看更改控制台窗口大小的完整效果。

trans-unit.source: The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key press.
trans-unit.target: 该示例报告设置为 85 列和 43 行的控制台窗口的尺寸，然后等待按键。

trans-unit.source: When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press.
trans-unit.target: 当按任意键时，控制台窗口的尺寸会减半、 报告的新维度，和示例等待另一个按键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, when any key is pressed the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates.
trans-unit.target: 最后，当按下任何键控制台窗口还原到其原始维度，该示例终止。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> property or the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 的值或属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 的值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property plus the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> property is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 的值加上属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> 的值大于或等于 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> property or the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property is greater than the largest possible window width or height for the current screen resolution and console font.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 属性的值或 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 属性的值大于当前屏幕分辨率和控制台字体的最大可能的窗口宽度或高度。

trans-unit.source: Error reading or writing information.
trans-unit.target: 读取或写入信息时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the leftmost position of the console window area relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控制台窗口区域的最左边相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。

trans-unit.source: The leftmost console window position measured in columns.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口的最左边的位置，以列为单位。

trans-unit.source: The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area.
trans-unit.target: 控制台到更大的矩形缓冲区区域表示的矩形窗口。

trans-unit.source: Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 窗口和缓冲区垂直测量了通过它们的行数和水平方向的列数。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义缓冲区的尺寸<xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the console area are defined by the <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义控制台区域的维度<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property determines which column of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性确定缓冲区的列显示在控制台窗口的第一列。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property can range from 0 to <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性可以介于 0 到<xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将其设置为的值超出了该范围将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: When a console window first opens, the default value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property is zero, which indicates that the first column shown by the console corresponds to the first column (the column at position zero) in the buffer area.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口首次打开时，默认值的<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性为零，指示由控制台所示的第一列对应于在缓冲区中的第一列 （位置零上的列）。

trans-unit.source: The default width of both the console window and the buffer area is 80 columns.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口和缓冲区的默认宽度为 80 的列。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property can be modified only if the console window is made narrower or the buffer area is made wider.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>只有控制台窗口变窄或缓冲区变宽，则可以修改属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the width of the buffer area exceeds the width of the console window, the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property is automatically adjusted when the user uses the horizontal scroll bar to define the window's relationship to the buffer area.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果缓冲区的宽度超过控制台窗口的值的宽度<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性自动调整当用户使用水平滚动条来到缓冲区定义窗口的关系。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property when output is redirected throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置的值<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性输出时重定向引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the <xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此异常，可以设置此属性仅当值<xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example opens an 80-column console window and defines a buffer area that is 120 columns wide.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例打开一个 80 列控制台窗口中，并定义 120 列宽的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: It displays information on window and buffer size, and then waits for the user to press either the LEFT ARROW key or the RIGHT ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: 它显示在窗口和缓冲区大小的信息，然后等待用户按左箭头键或向右箭头键。

trans-unit.source: In the former case, it decrements the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property by one if the result is a legal value.
trans-unit.target: 在以前的情况下，它递减的值<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>1 如果结果为非法值的属性。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, it increases the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property by one if the result would be legal.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，它的值增加<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>1 如果结果将是合法的属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the example does not have to handle an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>, because it checks that the value to be assigned to the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> property is not negative and does not cause the sum of the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> properties to exceed the <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该示例不需要处理<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>，因为它会检查的值分配给<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>属性不为负且不会导致的总和<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>属性超过<xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the value to be assigned is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，要赋予的值小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: As a result of the assignment, <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowLeft" /> plus <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> would exceed <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: 赋值之后，<see cref="P:System.Console.WindowLeft" /> 加 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 将超过 <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferWidth" />。

trans-unit.source: Error reading or writing information.
trans-unit.target: 读取或写入信息时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top position of the console window area relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控制台窗口区域的最顶部相对于屏幕缓冲区的位置。

trans-unit.source: The uppermost console window position measured in rows.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口最顶部的位置，以行为单位。

trans-unit.source: The console represents a rectangular window into a larger rectangular buffer area.
trans-unit.target: 控制台到更大的矩形缓冲区区域表示的矩形窗口。

trans-unit.source: Both the window and the buffer are measured vertically by their number of rows and horizontally by their number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 窗口和缓冲区垂直测量了通过它们的行数和水平方向的列数。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the buffer area are defined by the <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义缓冲区的尺寸<xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the console area are defined by the <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义控制台区域的维度<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A> property determines which row of the buffer area is displayed in the first column of the console window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>属性确定缓冲区的行显示在控制台窗口的第一列。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A> property can range from 0 to <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>属性可以介于 0 到<xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set it to a value outside that range throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将其设置为的值超出了该范围将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A> property when output is redirected throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置的值<xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>属性输出时重定向引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the exception, you can set the value of this property only if the <xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此异常，可以设置此属性仅当值<xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A> properties; and the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Console.WindowLeft%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowTop%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Console.BufferHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.CursorVisible%2A>属性; 与<xref:System.Console.SetWindowPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Console.SetBufferSize%2A>，和<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example draws a grid pattern in the screen buffer based on the screen buffer width.
trans-unit.target: 该示例基于屏幕缓冲区的宽度屏幕缓冲区中绘制网格模式。

trans-unit.source: Then the example moves the console window in response to which of the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, or RIGHT ARROW console keys is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例将移动到的向上箭头，按下的向下箭头、 向左键或向右箭头控制台键的响应中的控制台窗口。

trans-unit.source: The grid pattern helps you see the movement of the console window relative to the screen buffer.
trans-unit.target: 网格模式有助于你查看控制台窗口相对于屏幕缓冲区的移动。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the value to be assigned is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，要赋予的值小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: As a result of the assignment, <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> plus <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> would exceed <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 赋值之后，<see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> 加 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 将超过 <see cref="P:System.Console.BufferHeight" />。

trans-unit.source: Error reading or writing information.
trans-unit.target: 读取或写入信息时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the console window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控制台窗口的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the console window measured in columns.
trans-unit.target: 控制台窗口的宽度，以列为单位。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the value of the <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> property when output is redirected throws either an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置的值<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>属性在输出重定向时将引发或者<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>或<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。

trans-unit.source: To prevent an exception, you can set the value of this property only if the <xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现异常，可以设置此属性仅当值<xref:System.Console.IsOutputRedirected%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the <xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A> method, and the <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示<xref:System.Console.SetWindowSize%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowHeight%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You must run the example to see the full effect of changing the console window size.
trans-unit.target: 你必须运行该示例才能查看更改控制台窗口大小的完整效果。

trans-unit.source: The example reports the dimensions of a console window set to 85 columns and 43 rows, then waits for a key press.
trans-unit.target: 该示例报告设置为 85 列和 43 行的控制台窗口的尺寸，然后等待按键。

trans-unit.source: When any key is pressed, the dimensions of the console window are halved, the new dimensions are reported, and the example waits for another key press.
trans-unit.target: 当按任意键时，控制台窗口的尺寸会减半、 报告的新维度，和示例等待另一个按键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, when any key is pressed the console window is restored to its original dimensions and the example terminates.
trans-unit.target: 最后，当按下任何键控制台窗口还原到其原始维度，该示例终止。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> property or the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 的值或属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 的值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property plus the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> property is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 的值加上属性 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowTop" /> 的值大于或等于 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> property or the value of the <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> property is greater than the largest possible window width or height for the current screen resolution and console font.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowWidth" /> 属性的值或 <see cref="P:System.Console.WindowHeight" /> 属性的值大于当前屏幕分辨率和控制台字体的最大可能的窗口宽度或高度。

trans-unit.target: 读取或写入信息时发生错误。

trans-unit.target: 文本表示形式`value`由调用<xref:System.Boolean.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，该操作会输出<xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A composite format string.
trans-unit.target: 复合格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object to write using <c>format</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 <c>format</c> 写入的对象。

trans-unit.source: Writes the text representation of the specified object to the standard output stream using the specified format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式信息将指定对象的文本表示形式写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用[复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)要将对象的值转换为它的文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入在字符串中的.NET framework。

trans-unit.source: The resulting string is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 生成的字符串写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数由零个或多个文本混和组成，零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置的过程将每个格式项替换的文本表示形式相应对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted.
trans-unit.target: 格式项的语法是`{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，它指定强制索引、 可选长度和对齐方式的带格式的文本和一个可选的字符串的格式说明符字符用于控制如何设置相应的对象的值的格式。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the composite formatting feature supported by methods such as <xref:System.String.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder.AppendFormat%2A>, and some overloads of <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A>, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如方法支持复合格式设置功能的详细信息<xref:System.String.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder.AppendFormat%2A>，和的某些重载<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A>，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `arg` parameter is a parameter array.
trans-unit.target: `arg`参数是一个参数数组。

trans-unit.source: Arguments can be passed to the method either as an array or as list of five or more items.
trans-unit.target: 作为数组或五个或多个项的列表，则可以将自变量传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: The examples illustrate both forms of method call.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例说明了两种形式的方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Person` class with a number of properties that provide information about a person.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`Person`与大量的属性提供了有关个人信息的类。

trans-unit.source: Its `GetDescription` method returns an array that contains all of the property values except one.
trans-unit.target: 其`GetDescription`方法返回一个数组，包含所有属性值，但一个除外。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the array returned by the `GetDescription` method to display the values of the Person object.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例使用返回的数组`GetDescription`方法以显示 Person 对象的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the example calls the <xref:System.Console.Write%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method rather than the <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method because it attempts to display the value of the `Person.Remarks` property on the same line.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该示例调用<xref:System.Console.Write%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>方法而不是<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>方法因为它尝试显示的值`Person.Remarks`同一行上的属性。

trans-unit.source: To do this, it examines the value of the <xref:System.Console.CursorLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A> properties to determine whether there is enough space for the remark to fit.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，它检查的值<xref:System.Console.CursorLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Console.WindowWidth%2A>属性，以确定是否有足够的空间以适合的批注。

trans-unit.source: If there is, it displays the line.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，它显示的行。

trans-unit.source: If not, it writes a line, indents three spaces, and displays the remark.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，它写入行，缩进三个空格，并显示备注。

trans-unit.source: The following example is identical to the first, except that it supplies a five-item list as the `arg` argument instead of a parameter array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是第一个，相同，但它会提供一个五项列表作为`arg`而不是参数数组的自变量。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called by C++ code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不由 c + + 代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The C++ compiler resolves calls to [System.Console.Write](xref:System.Console.Write*) that include a string and a list of four or more object parameters as a call to <see cref="M:System.Console.Write(System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: C + + 编译器将解析对调用[System.Console.Write](xref:System.Console.Write*) ，作为对的调用中包含字符串和四个或多个对象参数的列表<see cref="M:System.Console.Write(System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: It resolves calls to [System.Console.Write](xref:System.Console.Write*) that include a string and an object array as a call to <see cref="M:System.Console.Write(System.String,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 它解析到调用[System.Console.Write](xref:System.Console.Write*) ，作为对的调用中包含字符串和一个对象数组<see cref="M:System.Console.Write(System.String,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字符的数组。

trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified subarray of Unicode characters to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 Unicode 字符子数组写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: This method writes `count` characters starting at position `index` of `buffer` to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将写入`count`字符位置开始`index`的`buffer`写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> plus <paramref name="count" /> specify a position that is not within <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 加 <paramref name="count" /> 指定不在 <paramref name="buffer" /> 内的位置。

trans-unit.source: Writes the text representation of the specified objects to the standard output stream using the specified format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式信息将指定对象的文本表示形式写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the [composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用[复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)要将对象的值转换为它的文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入在字符串中的.NET framework。

trans-unit.source: The resulting string is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 生成的字符串写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数由零个或多个文本混和组成，零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The formatting process replaces each format item with the text representation of the value of the corresponding object.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置的过程将每个格式项替换的文本表示形式相应对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of a format item is `{`*index*[`,`*alignment*][`:`*formatString*]`}`, which specifies a mandatory index, the optional length and alignment of the formatted text, and an optional string of format specifier characters that govern how the value of the corresponding object is formatted.
trans-unit.target: 格式项的语法是`{`*索引*[`,`*对齐*] [`:`*formatString*]`}`，它指定强制索引、 可选长度和对齐方式的带格式的文本和一个可选的字符串的格式说明符字符用于控制如何设置相应的对象的值的格式。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified data, followed by the current line terminator, to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的数据（后跟当前行终止符）写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: The default line terminator is a string whose value is a carriage return followed by a line feed ("\r\n" in C#, or `vbCrLf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认的行终止符是其值是回车符后跟换行符的字符串 ("\r\n"在 C# 中，或`vbCrLf`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You can change the line terminator by setting the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A> property to another string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置更改的行终止符<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Console.Out%2A>到另一个字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: Writes the current line terminator to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将当前行终止符写入标准输出流。

trans-unit.source: The default line terminator is a string whose value is a carriage return followed by a line feed ("\r\n" in C#, or `vbCrLf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认的行终止符是其值是回车符后跟换行符的字符串 ("\r\n"在 C# 中，或`vbCrLf`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You can change the line terminator by setting the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A> property to another string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置更改的行终止符<xref:System.IO.TextWriter.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Console.Out%2A>到另一个字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: The example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 说明如示例所示。

The example changes the line terminator from its default value of "
" or `vbCrLf` to "

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, only the line terminator is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `value` 为 `null`，则只写入行终止符。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `ToString` method of `value` is called to produce its string representation, and the resulting string is written to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 否则为`ToString`方法`value`调用以生成其字符串表示形式中，并且生成的字符串会写入到标准输出流。
